backend/main.mo: Main actor defining resident-related types and comparison utilities, integrating authorization, storage mixins, and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Module defining legacy and new actor state structures for safe upgrades, including all resident‑related types and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high‑level summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Primary production deployment checklist covering verification steps, deployment methods, logging, and rollback guidance.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file describing the purpose and contents of the deployment logs directory.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment checklist specific to Version 89 with manual steps, retry script notes, and smoke‑test requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining base styles, color variables, and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the frontend root element and main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Template metadata file overwritten during deployment with build version, commit, and timestamp.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Script performing a clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend with logging and build metadata injection.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Legacy script for rebuilding and deploying Version 89 only, including canister ID extraction.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive CLI script guiding operators through smoke tests and validating deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Automates production frontend rebuild and deployment to the IC network, logging actions and capturing canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/restart_backend_caniste: Checks backend canister status on the IC network and starts or restarts it depending on the provided mode.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed smoke test checklist for verifying core app functionality after deploying Version 89.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, routing, and startup diagnostics including health checks and timeout logic.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for submitting ADL records for a resident, validating fields and sending data through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog form for entering daily vitals for a resident, converting inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog form for recording medication administration, selecting active medications and submitting the record.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog form allowing users to add a medication to a resident, including dosage, route, times, and physician matching with submission via useAddMedication.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large admin‑gated dialog for creating residents with multi-section forms for personal info, physicians, insurance, pharmacy, and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a weight entry to a resident, converting dates to nanoseconds and submitting using useAddWeightEntry.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component that displays a logo image with size and mode options and falls back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Indicator showing frontend build info and backend canister ID with fallback handling for missing metadata and tooltip diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing an existing medication with prefilled fields, physician resolution, and update submission via useUpdateMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large admin-only form dialog for editing all resident fields, including physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons with prefill and update submission.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that saves the caller’s name and employee ID using a startup mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays detailed startup errors, diagnostics, and retry/logout controls, including special handling for stopped backend canisters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context, loading stored identities, and handling Internet Identity login and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for registration, profile loading, and other backend interactions using resilient actors and timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: React hook that initializes a backend actor with timeouts, optional admin token setup, and resilient error handling via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark theme variables, dialog overrides, and detailed print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Utilities for wrapping promises with timeouts and classifying backend errors such as stopped canisters, missing canisters, network failures, and timeouts.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates normalized asset URLs using Vite’s base path while preventing duplicate slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata from environment variables or a fallback file and constructs version/identifier strings for different environments.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to and from backend nanosecond timestamps and provides formatting and age-calculation helpers without timezone distortion.
frontend/src/lib/registrationErrorMappin: Maps backend registration errors to user-friendly messages and detects anonymous or provisioning-related errors.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps RoomType and ResidentStatus enums to strings and back, including backward-compatibility aliases.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Provides backend diagnostics extraction and a timeout-protected backend health check.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized startup timeout constants for various frontend operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing active and discharged residents with admin actions, loading states, and retry handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with a branded UI and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page with admin-gated editing, multiple record dialogs, and retryable data fetch.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color palette, layout settings, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to adding an admin principal.
